casebody.data:
Dwight Ashley and Another, Appellants, v. James W. Whitney, et al., Respondents. Decided May 6, 1889. Appeal from order denying plaintiffs’ motion for a reference. Baldwin & Blackmar, for appellants. Arnoux, Ritch & Wood-ford,. for respondents.

Before Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam:

The order appealed from should be affirmed with $10 costs and disbursements.
